title: ProblemsList
description: An array of structured problem statements extracted from source material.

items.title: ProblemDescription
items.description: A structured description of a problem statement extracted from source material.

problem.description: A concise, factual statement describing the problem as explicitly stated or clearly implied in the source material. Must not include assumptions, interpretations, or information not present in the original content.

details.description: Additional context, constraints, or specifications about the problem that are explicitly mentioned in the source material. Should only include verifiable details from the original content, not inferred or assumed information.
